definition: home/family/(polite) my (sister, uncle etc)/classifier for families or businesses/refers to the philosophical schools of pre-Han China/noun suffix for a specialist in some activity, such as a musician or revolutionary, corresponding to English -ist, -er, -ary or -ian/CL:個|个[ge4]
a family bereaved of its only child

sentences.english: He got all the big scoops for the paper.
sentences.chinese: 他爲本報弄到所有的頭號獨家新聞。

sentences.english: It's also an issue of exclusivity.
sentences.chinese: 這也是一個獨家經營權問題。

sentences.english: I propose a sole agency aGREement for bicycles for a period of 3 years.
sentences.chinese: 我建議訂專銷自行車的爲期三年的獨家代理協議。

sentences.english: InfoQ brings you an  exclusive pdf chapter excerpt from this new book.
sentences.chinese: InfoQ爲您獨家帶來本書的章節節選。

sentences.english: If you are considering relocating to Key Largo , here is the scoop on it.
sentences.chinese: 如果您正在考慮遷移到基拉戈，這裏是它的獨家新聞。

sentences.english: Embargoes lead to more total coverage than exclusives.
sentences.chinese: 保密協議比獨家報道的覆蓋面更加廣泛。

sentences.english: Exclusive distribution of "HIESTAND Swiss Gourmet Bakery" leader in frozen premium good.
sentences.chinese: 的獨家經銷商，優質冷凍產品的龍頭企業。

sentences.english: The Holy Box was released the same year by Lucretia Records including exclusive acoustic tracks.
sentences.chinese: 聖盒被釋放，同年由盧克記錄包括獨家聲曲目。

sentences.english: Both of these wineries are imported and distributed exclusively by Summergate in China.
sentences.chinese: 這兩款酒均由美夏公司在中國獨家進口經銷。

sentences.english: We are very interested in an exclusive arrangement with your factoryfor the promotion of your products in Bahrain.
sentences.chinese: 盼望能成爲貴公司獨家代理，促銷在巴林市場的貨品。

sentences.english: You can get pre-releases, plus unique exclusive tracks and remixes.
sentences.chinese: 你可以預先發布，加上獨家收錄的歌曲和混音。

sentences.english: We should be interested in acting as your sole agent.
sentences.chinese: 我們很苦願問應做貴公司的獨家代庖代理人。

sentences.english: See ShangQian struggle, zhuo or will inform ShangQian exclusive news.
sentences.chinese: 看見尚謙的拼搏行徑，卓或便將獨家消息告知尚謙。

sentences.english: It is learned that Tianjin has more than 30 air exclusive implementation of the route .
sentences.chinese: 據瞭解，目前天津航空擁有30餘條獨家執行的航線。

sentences.english: Everyone was surprised by the Times exclusive about the prince' marriage.
sentences.chinese: 泰晤士報關於王子大婚的獨家新聞令很多人驚奇不已。

sentences.english: Set up a market observer, protect agent's exclusive interests strictly .
sentences.chinese: 設立市場監測員，嚴格保護代理商獨家利益。

definition: to belong or be dedicated exclusively to/proprietary/private/personal
carefully chosen/handpicked/best of the bunch/choice (product)/concentration (mining)/to concentrate/to winnow
unique and unmatched (idiom); unrivalled/nothing compares with it
entity/substance/thing that has a material existence (as opposed to a conceptual, virtual or online existence)/the real thing (as opposed to an image or model of it)
to assemble/to concentrate/to mass/to build up/to marshal
network (computer, telecom)/Internet/Taiwanese term for 網絡|网络[wang3 luo4]
on the eve of/to be about to/to be on the verge of
